text: Amy Belle Sawyer Stiller (born August 9, 1961) is an American actress, stand- up comedian and Bikram Yoga instructor. ==Early life== She was born in New York, New York. She is the daughter of the Jewish-American comedians Jerry Stiller and Anne Meara, and the older sister of actor Ben Stiller. She graduated from the United Nations International School, in New York City, in 1979. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American comedians Category:Comedians from New York City
title: Amy Stiller
